channel.title: Rush Craft - Survival - New - 1.9 - + More!
channel.description:
[center][b] [IMG]http://rushpk.com/forum/public/style_images/uniform/logo.png[/img] [b]Link(s):[/b] ---> [url=http://"Http://minecraft.rushpk.com"]Rush Craft Forums[/url] <--- [b]Join IP:[/b] ---> dgn-xbox.com <--- This is the IP enter it and login, this is not the forums. This may be changed in the future with a updated one on the forums! We use a professional forum software with a nice layout for Minecraft, come check it out!
Since we are brand new, we don't have many things built yet. We are working on building a lot of things soon, come help us out? :D
[b]Picture(s):[/b] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/sblbfp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/13zydsk.png[/img]
[b]Staff:[/b] Owner: Keith(Illpku567) Admin: Deox_Zero Moderator: Open Moderator: Open Server Helper: Open Server Helper: Open Server Helper: Open
[b]Plugins:[/b] NoCheat Citizens JailLikeHell Essentials LWC WorldEdit WorldGuard Sortal MCmmo MotherNature WorldEdit + More [b]Have any suggestions for more plugins? Please, please post them![/b]
[b]Features:[/b] PVP: No (Will be voted upon if people want it. Although will be adding arenas soon!) TNT: OFF (Prevents Griefers) Locked Chest /sethome /home /back /help 1-? for more commands /sell hand(Sells the item in your hand) /sell itemname etc.. + Alot more! Just check for all the commands.
This is a Survival Server RPG.
Please at least try us ou! :D
Http://Minecraft.RushPk.com [/center]

TNT: OFF (Prevents Griefers)
